definition: to sue/to take to court/to file a lawsuit
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: Chen accuses his son of being not filial and asks for solatium .
sentences.chinese: 陳平狀告兒子不孝，並且索要贍養費。

sentences.english: The boy's mother was very angry and filed a lawsuit in court.
sentences.chinese: 少年母親十分生氣便一狀告上法院。

sentences.english: The parents would certainly sue the schools for mistreating their children.
sentences.chinese: 中國家長估計會狀告學校虐待他的孩子。
